text: @BBCBreaking The correlation between 5G, 60 GHz and the coronavirus symptoms, needs to be done and looked seriously into. Telecoms own literature says 60 GHz is absorbed by oxygen. Destroys our cells ability to take oxygen in and distributed to our body. What the heck! Check into this!
